document.full_text: hundreds of saudi shi'ites staged a protest in the kingdom's oil-producing eastern province friday calling for prisoner releases and a withdrawal of saudi forces from bahrain, activists said.
document.title: hundreds of saudi shi'ites protest in east
lines_and_colors: hundreds of saudi shi'ites staged a protest in the kingdom's oil-producing eastern province friday calling for prisoner releases and a withdrawal of saudi forces from bahrain, activists said.
